(forest-survival [forestsurvival], female [female])

magic paths [mpath]: F1 E3 D3 R19
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Ainra is a Sorceress of great power. She is the Mistress of the God Mountain and carries one of the Three Keys to the Deepest Chamber. She is the Lady of Death and it is she who grants the power of shapeshifting to newly trained Sorceresses. Ainra can change shape at will and is even able to retain some of her magical skills in spider form.
